mapper.sql: reply_num as replyNum, board_num as boardNum,teacher_num as teacherNum, reply_contents as replyContents, reply_date as replyDate
mapper.insert: insert into reply (reply_num, board_num, teacher_num, reply_contents, reply_date) values (#{replyNum}, #{boardNum}, #{teacherNum}, #{replyContents}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select from reply where board_num = #{boardNum} order by reply_num asc
mapper.update: update reply set reply_contents = #{replyContents}, reply_date = sysdate
